    • Uses of GameScreen in metro.GameScreen.MainView

      Subclasses of GameScreen in metro.GameScreen.MainView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainView
      The main view is the normal screen the player sees.
      class  StationPlacingTool
      A station placing tool makes it possible to create train stations.
      class  Toolbar
      This is the bar on the side with the "build station", "build tracks", "show line view" and "create train" buttons.
      class  TrackPlacingTool
      A track placing tool is used by the player to build new tracks for the trains.

    • Uses of GameScreen in metro.GameScreen.MainView.LineView

      Subclasses of GameScreen in metro.GameScreen.MainView.LineView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LineSelectTool
      The LineSelectTool allows the user to create train lines by clicking on all the nodes this line should contain.
      class  LineView
      The LineView is a dialog to manage the train lines in METRO.

    • Uses of GameScreen in metro.GameScreen.MainView.PlayingField

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CityView
      GameScreen with the city view.
      class  PlayingField
      The playing field is the area where trains are driving, the stations are placed and the nodes live peaceful together with the tracks and train lines.

      The dialog to buy, sell and manage trains.
      class  TrainViewBuy
      A part of the TrainView where the user can buy new trains.
      class  TrainViewMain
      This dialog part shows the lines and the trains attached to them.
